I was at a bus stop this morning. There was some guy in a lawn chair at the corner with a "Jesus saves" poster (or something equivalent). He was chatting with another guy; his voice was loud and I heard they were having a discussion of things biblical. I proceeded to read my book, waiting for the bus.
 
 The other fellow left and the lawn chair guy started preaching. You know the spiel, that inane blather that essentially is saying the same thing over and over and over and gets no where. Not a problem, except he was speaking VERY loudly. He had this booming basso voice that was quite intrusive - I couldn't read with him shouting out not ten feet away.
 
 I approached him and said, "Excuse me, sir, but..." He started speaking louder, utterly ignoring me. I repeated, "Sir, would you mind speaking more softly? I can't even read with you..." He looked directly at me and kept up his tirade.
 
 He was clearly being very rude. Exactly the same as if someone was playing loud music. He understood he was being bothersome and clearly didn't care. He had been telling the other guy that this was "his calling" and he seemed to think that his caterwauling was beneficial to those within ear shot. 
 
 My questions:
 What is someone like that thinking? Is he being a good Christian by being rude?
 What is the law here? When does free speech become disturbing the peace?

 Persoanlly, I'd bring a loud boom-box next time and simply crank it louder than he's yelling. But, not too loud to violate noise ordinances.
 
 Also, I don't think he has to be bothering more than one person. You can still call the police and make a report. They'll show, probably do nothing more than warn him...BUT, if it happens enough, they just migth taser him. I hear it's popular in some places to simply taser 1st and ask questions later.
 
 But, I'm about 99.9% sure that sitting in a 'lawn chair' on the corner costitutes loitering or some other public nuisance charge.

Where my girlfriend lives we have a local fundie group of about 8-12 people. What they do is stand across from the Tower block and use a megaphone to denounce everyone in the local vicinity as sinners. This can go on for an hour or more, they then stop and next time they move to the next tower block. This happens almost every weekend.
 
 My girlfriend has called the police on them twice and each time the Police move them on but do nothing else. To me if that was any other group but a religious group they would be locked away as a public nuisance. For example if I started doing the same thing but instead of quoting scripture I quoted Marx I would probably rightly be told where to go by the Police.
 
 The next time I see them I may confront them and ask why they do such a thing, it would be interesting to see what kind of mindset it takes to be such a pain in the arse.

 One of the more interesting aspects of a developed tongues speaker is that sometimes the sounds they make seem like another language. Most achieve this via practicing to make it 'sound better'. Borrowing sounds from established languages that they might have been exposed to to make the gibberish they spew seem like a real language.
 It lends an air of authenticity to their behavior.
 
 Most tounges speakers start out with child like noise "da da daaada da da daaada di saa da" for example.
